elite.description: Kill the Hueycoatl perfectly 5 times without leaving. To get a perfect kill, you must not take any avoidable damage from the Hueycoatl's lightning attack, tail slam attack or off-prayer projectile attacks.

elite.name: Mimic Veteran
elite.description: Kill the Mimic once.

elite.name: Nightmare (Solo) Speed-Trialist
elite.description: Defeat the Nightmare (Solo) in less than 23 minutes.

elite.name: Nightmare (5-Scale) Speed-Trialist
elite.description: Defeat the Nightmare (5-scale) in less than 5 minutes.

elite.name: Nightmare Veteran
elite.description: Kill The Nightmare 25 times.

elite.name: Sleep Tight
elite.description: Kill the Nightmare solo.

elite.name: Explosion!
elite.description: Kill two Husks at the same time.

elite.name: Theatre of Blood Veteran
elite.description: Complete the Theatre of Blood 25 times.

elite.name: Pass It On
elite.description: In the Theatre of Blood: Entry Mode, successfully pass on the green ball to a team mate.

elite.name: Appropriate Tools
elite.description: Defeat the Pestilent Bloat in the Theatre of Blood: Entry Mode with everyone having a salve amulet equipped.

elite.name: Nylocas, On the Rocks
elite.description: In the Theatre of Blood: Entry Mode, freeze any 4 Nylocas with a single Ice Barrage spell.

elite.name: Anticoagulants
elite.description: Defeat the Maiden of Sugadinti in the Theatre of Blood: Entry Mode without letting any bloodspawn live for longer than 10 seconds.

elite.name: Just To Be Safe
elite.description: Defeat Sotetseg in the Theatre of Blood: Entry Mode after having split the big ball with your entire team. This must be done with a group size of at least 2.

elite.name: No-Pillar
elite.description: Survive Verzik Vitur's pillar phase in the Theatre of Blood: Entry Mode without losing a single pillar.

elite.name: Chally Time
elite.description: Defeat the Pestilent Bloat in the Theatre of Blood: Entry Mode by using a halberd special attack as your final attack.

elite.name: Attack, Step, Wait
elite.description: Survive Verzik Vitur's second phase in the Theatre of Blood: Entry Mode without anyone getting bounced by Verzik.

elite.name: They Won't Expect This
elite.description: In the Theatre of Blood: Entry Mode, enter the Pestilent Bloat room from the opposite side.

elite.name: Don't Look at Me!
elite.description: Kill Xarpus in the Theatre of Blood: Entry Mode without him reflecting any damage to anyone.

elite.name: Spec'd Out
elite.description: Kill the Thermonuclear Smoke Devil using only special attacks.

elite.name: Thermonuclear Veteran
elite.description: Kill the Thermonuclear Smoke Devil 20 times.

elite.name: Hazard Prevention
elite.description: Kill the Thermonuclear Smoke Devil without it hitting anyone.

elite.name: Perfect Apmeken
elite.description: Complete the Apmeken room in a group of two or more, without anyone allowing any dangers to trigger, standing in venom or being hit by a volatile baboon. You must complete this room in less than three minutes.

elite.name: I'm in a rush
elite.description: Defeat Ba-Ba after destroying four or fewer rolling boulders in total without dying yourself.

elite.name: Hardcore Raiders
elite.description: Complete the Tombs of Amascut in a group of two or more without anyone dying.

elite.name: Perfect Het
elite.description: Complete the Het room without taking any damage from the light beam and orbs. You must destroy the core after one exposure.

elite.name: Down Do Specs
elite.description: Defeat the Wardens after staggering the boss a maximum of twice during phase two, without dying yourself.

elite.name: Perfect Crondis
elite.description: Complete the Crondis room without letting a crocodile get to the tree, without anyone losing water from their container and in under one minute.

elite.name: Dropped the ball
elite.description: Defeat Akkha without dropping any materialising orbs and without dying yourself.

elite.name: Tomb Explorer
elite.description: Complete the Tombs of Amascut once.

elite.name: Hardcore Tombs
elite.description: Complete the Tombs of Amascut solo without dying.

elite.name: No skipping allowed
elite.description: Defeat Ba-Ba after only attacking the non-weakened boulders in the rolling boulder phase, without dying yourself. The Boulderdash invocation must be activated.

elite.name: Helpful spirit who?
elite.description: Complete the Tombs of Amascut without using any supplies from the Helpful Spirit and without anyone dying. Honey locusts are included in this restriction.

elite.name: Novice Tomb Raider
elite.description: Complete the Tombs of Amascut in Entry mode (or above) 50 times.

elite.name: Expert Tomb Explorer
elite.description: Complete the Tombs of Amascut (Expert mode) once.

elite.name: Through Fire and Flames
elite.description: Kill a Tormented Demon whilst their shield is inactive.

elite.name: Unending Torment
elite.description: Kill a Tormented Demon.

elite.name: Rapid Reload
elite.description: Hit three Tormented Demons within 3 seconds using a ballista or a crossbow.

elite.name: Two Times the Torment
elite.description: Kill two Tormented Demons within 2 seconds.

elite.name: TzHaar-Ket-Rak's Speed-Trialist
elite.description: Complete TzHaar-Ket-Rak's first challenge in less than 45 seconds.

elite.name: The II Jad Challenge
elite.description: Complete TzHaar-Ket-Rak's second challenge.

elite.name: Facing Jad Head-on III
elite.description: Complete TzHaar-Ket-Rak's second challenge with only melee.

elite.name: Half-Way There
elite.description: Kill a Jal-Zek within the Inferno.

elite.name: Fight Caves Veteran
elite.description: Complete the Fight Caves once.

elite.name: Facing Jad Head-on
elite.description: Complete the Fight Caves with only melee.

elite.name: A Near Miss!
elite.description: Complete the Fight Caves after surviving a hit from TzTok-Jad without praying.

elite.name: Vardorvis Speed-Trialist
elite.description: Kill Vardorvis in less than 1:15 minutes without a slayer task.

elite.name: Vardorvis Adept
elite.description: Kill Vardorvis once.

elite.name: Venenatis Veteran
elite.description: Kill Venenatis 20 times.

elite.name: Vet'eran
elite.description: Kill Vet'ion 20 times.

elite.name: Zombie Destroyer
elite.description: Kill Vorkath's zombified spawn without using crumble undead.

elite.name: Stick 'em With the Pointy End
elite.description: Kill Vorkath using melee weapons only.

elite.name: Vorkath Veteran
elite.description: Kill Vorkath 50 times.

elite.name: Whisperer Speed-Trialist
elite.description: Kill the Whisperer in less than 3:00 without a slayer task.

elite.name: Tentacular
elite.description: Kill the Whisperer whilst only being on the Arceuus spellbook.

elite.name: Whisperer Adept
elite.description: Kill the Whisperer once.

elite.name: Yama Speed-Trialist
elite.description: Defeat Yama in an average time of under 3:38 over your last four kills.

elite.name: Yama Adept
elite.description: Defeat Yama once.

elite.name: Back so soon?
elite.description: Defeat Yama without the judge being attacked with the wrong style and without taking more than one instance of damage each time you are exiled from the arena.

elite.name: Perfect Zalcano
elite.description: Kill Zalcano 5 times in a row without leaving or getting hit by the following: Falling rocks, rock explosions, Zalcano powering up, or standing in a red symbol.

elite.name: Team Player
elite.description: Receive imbued tephra from a golem.

elite.name: Zalcano Veteran
elite.description: Kill Zalcano 25 times.

elite.name: The Spurned Hero
elite.description: Kill Zalcano as the player who has dealt the most damage to her.

elite.name: Zulrah Veteran
elite.description: Kill Zulrah 75 times.

elite.name: Snake Rebound
elite.description: Kill Zulrah by using the Vengeance spell as the finishing blow.

elite.name: Snake. Snake!? Snaaaaaake!
elite.description: Kill 3 Snakelings simultaneously.

elite.name: Zulrah Speed-Trialist
elite.description: Kill Zulrah in less than 1 minute 20 seconds, without a slayer task.
